name: Windy Sky Dash
description:
The ultimate mobile challenge is here!

The simple, but very exciting arcade, in which you have to resist the wind to rise higher into the sky!

Tap to make a dash against the wind and dodge many different barriers! Can you keep control, stay in the gaming area and score more points?

★ Bright and sightly graphics
★ Change of time of day
★ Endless gameplay
★ One finger control 
★ Daily random rewards
★ Cosmetic upgrades

Install and play right now!
